Metadata.Title: How to Validate Input Parameters
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Jason Taylor, Prashant Bansode, Carlos Farre, Madhu Sundararajan, Rob Boucher, Steve Gregersen

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Microsoft® Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 3.5
  • Microsoft Visual Studio® 2008

Description

Implement BeforeCall() on the parameter inspector to validate input parameters on a client or service. Inside BeforeCall() implement the validation logic to validate the parameters.

public class ValidationParameterInspector : IParameterInspector
{
public object BeforeCall(string operationName, object[] inputs)
{ …    }
}
